name: feeds_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yummly.
Tool description: API to query data about recipe, plan, ingredients, etc... as on official site
API description: Search for recipes by name and optional filters.

start.description: The offset of items to be ignored in the response for paging.

maxresult.description: The number of items returned per response.

allowedattribute.description: The value of id field returned in tags/list (separated by comma for multiple value)

sweetmax.description: How much sweet the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

q.description: Query string to search for specific food or ingredient.

fat_kcalmax.description: Maximum amount of calories from fat (in kcal).

maxtotaltimeinseconds.description: Maximum total time to prepare the dish (in seconds).

piquantmax.description: How much piquant the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

vita_iumax.description: Maximum amount of vitamin A (in IU).

vitcmax.description: Maximum amount of vitamin C (in milligrams).

meatymax.description: How much meaty the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

fasatmax.description: Maximum amount of saturated fat (in grams).

sweetmin.description: How much sweet the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

piquantmin.description: How much piquant the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

fatmax.description: Maximum amount of total fat (in grams).

sourmin.description: How much sour the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

meatymin.description: How much meaty the meal is, such as 0.2 (0 to 1)

sourmax.description: How much sour the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

saltymin.description: How much salty the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)

saltymax.description: How much salty the meal is, such as 0.8 (0 to 1)
